mapper.update:
update channel_ha_vrids
channel_ha_id = #{channelHaId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
channel_info_id = #{channelInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
vrid = #{vrid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
if_id = #{ifId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
if_name = #{ifName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vip = #{vip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_area = #{workArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update channel_ha_vrids set channel_ha_id = #{channelHaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, channel_info_id = #{channelInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, vrid = #{vrid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, if_id = #{ifId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, if_name = #{ifName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vip = #{vip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_area = #{workArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select if_id from channel_ha_vrids where channel_ha_id IN ( select channel_ha_id from channel_ha_device where enable = 1 AND work_state = 3 )
